item.description:
I'm new to Boston and people have told me about Wrentham. Let's go outlet shopping before it gets too cold. We will meet at 10:30 am to beat some of the traffic.

 

If you need a ride, please note that in your RSVP or if you can provide a ride also. Be sure to include your location or which T stop you can meet at.

How to get there - carppooling is recommended. To help share with gas, please pay $5 carpool fee to the driver.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet at the main office where you can p/u discount coupons if you have Triple A card.

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: A Trip to the outlet Wrentham Village Premium Outlets
